description: In one of the hottest, more passion filled scenes we've ever seen, much less filmed, Jacob and Justin, one of the most perfectly couples on the planet, allow us into their bedroom for not just merely an episode of Mo30, but an observation of the total bliss only that rare volcanic eruption that only occurs when making love is done to the backdrop of raw, unbridled lust. Jacob is a handsome faced, broad shoulder confident man and every inch of that awesome body and perfect cock is worshiped by 19 year old Justin, his angel-faced lover with whose smooth little body, ever hard cock and delectable hungry hole can only be described as a sexual theme park!One of the things that makes this so electric is the mind blowing combination of the way they run the gamut form tender love making to the deepest, almost primal breeding rites and back again. Very very rarely have we ever been given entrance to such intimacy, such chemistry and such plain hot action.  I know they are always ready for more and we're already planning round two. Keep you fingers crossed they will allow us back into the bedroom to see them celebrate their one year anniversary.  I'd start stocking up on kleenex now...we are are!  Enjoy!
title: Jacob & Justin The Movie, Scene #02
